mapper.select: SELECT rc.*, b.name AS bank_name FROM receipt_cheque rc LEFT JOIN bank b ON rc.bank_id = b.id WHERE rc.receipt_id = #{receiptId} AND rc.receipt_type = #{receiptType} ORDER BY rc.id
SELECT rc.*, b.name AS bank_name FROM receipt_cheque rc LEFT JOIN bank b ON rc.bank_id = b.id WHERE rc.check_number = #{checkNumber} AND rc.receipt_type = #{receiptType}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO receipt_cheque ( receipt_id, receipt_type, check_number, due_date, amount, holder_name, bank_id, created_at ) VALUES ( #{receiptId}, #{receiptType}, #{checkNumber}, #{dueDate}, #{amount}, #{holderName}, #{bankId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
